daugt-access::entitlements.name: Entitlement
daugt-access::entitlements.validity_star: Optional. Access starts at this date and time.
daugt-access::entitlements.validity_end_: Optional. Access ends at this date and time.
daugt-access::entitlements.keep_accessib: Keep access to content unlocked during this timeslot even after it ends.
daugt-access::entitlements.keep_unlocked: While active, unlock all content in the target entry.
